member.name: M:Microsoft.Kinect.CoordinateMapper.GetDepthFrameToCameraSpaceTable(Microsoft.Kinect.PointF[])
member.summary: Generates a table of camera space points. This is a set of the X and Y components of rays with unit length in Z. Each pixel's X and Y, when multiplied by its corresponding depth value, yields a position in camera space. This table data may be copied into a texture to be used to compute a 3D depth visualization using shaders.
member.param: The to-be-filled array of the table.
member.remarks: The tableEntries array should be the size of the number of depth frame pixels.
